scripts.publish.nast: npm run build.nast && npm run build.lib && npm publish nast
scripts.publish.api: npm run build.api && npm publish nast-api
scripts.publish.router: npm run build.router && npm publish nast-router
scripts.publish.store: npm run build.store && npm publish nast-store
scripts.publish.form: npm run build.form && npm publish nast-form
scripts.publish.auth: npm run build.auth && npm publish nast-auth
